entries.name: Veronica Wright
entries.testimonial: He is an excellent shopper — a true gentleman who always goes above and beyond. I would welcome him into my home any time.

entries.name: Peter Rochfort
entries.testimonial: He helps with my groceries and even plays guitar for Peter, which brought back wonderful memories from his band days. We were joking that we should adopt him!

entries.name: Mrs Jarvis (for Harold Jarvis)
entries.testimonial: My scheduler is always cheerful, pleasant, and incredibly helpful every single time. Any change to Harold’s visits is always communicated clearly by phone or text.

entries.name: Rosa Mignanelli
entries.testimonial: After I had a fall, my care support worker did everything she could to help — she was truly lovely. I was very grateful for her support.

entries.name: Eugen Kozic
entries.testimonial: I’m very satisfied with my care support worker today and would love to have him back again.

entries.name: Marian Robinson
entries.testimonial: I’m settling in well and feeling much better. I’m grateful for all the support provided — thank you for helping me through this transition.

entries.name: Jennifer Ruth Ransom
entries.testimonial: I’m very happy with my care support worker and would love to have her support whenever possible. She’s been wonderful.

entries.name: Pamela June Mahoney
entries.testimonial: Thank you so much for all the support. I’m very happy with the non-slip socks I received.

entries.name: Sabina Morgan
entries.testimonial: My care worker was wonderful and I’m very happy with Mosaic’s support. I’m grateful for everything you’ve provided.

entries.name: Ronald Madge
entries.testimonial: Ron has developed a wonderful rapport with his carer — they even enjoy playing soccer together in the park on sunny days. Since the carers have come into his life, his mind has been much more stimulated and his conversations more lively.

entries.name: Nadezhda Aubin
entries.testimonial: Your centre supported us through a domestic violence situation and helped us organise everything we needed to survive. Elena has supported my family for over a year — she’s a blessing. Thank you for having such a wonderful specialist.

entries.name: Roger Turner
entries.testimonial: I wanted to pass on how pleased I am with my care worker. She did a wonderful job and I’m grateful for her support.

entries.name: Jocelyn Dowding
entries.testimonial: Your receptionist is always so pleasant and helpful on the phone. She makes every interaction easy.

entries.name: Nathan Truong
entries.testimonial: Bronwyn’s empathy, patience, and dedication have made such a difference in my life. She listens without judgment, always advocates on my behalf, and has helped me feel respected and supported.

entries.name: Tara Tamanna
entries.testimonial: Mosaic has been incredible in supporting my settlement journey, especially through my case worker. She helped us with housing, improving my resume, finding employment, and guided me both practically and emotionally.

entries.name: Ali
entries.testimonial: Bronwyn has been amazing to work with — intelligent, professional, and always understanding what’s needed. We felt so comfortable and supported throughout.

entries.name: Terez Al Talli
entries.testimonial: I’m very happy with Bronwyn’s help. She is respectful, caring, and adds great value to Mosaic.

entries.name: Joop de Wit
entries.testimonial: Volunteering has given me a sense of purpose since 1983 — it’s incredibly rewarding to help people in their own language and connect deeply with others. Over the years, these connections have become like an extended family to me, widening my world through culture, friendship, and shared experiences.

entries.name: Dennis Archibald
entries.testimonial: I love helping migrant refugees build a new life in Australia — it’s meaningful and fulfilling. As the child of migrants myself, I want newcomers to feel welcome and supported. Mosaic’s staff and volunteers have been wonderful to work with.

entries.name: Shani Herat Gunaratne
entries.testimonial: Meeting the students and learning about their journeys has been inspiring — their resilience and can-do attitude amaze me. Watching them grow socially and academically is incredibly rewarding. As the child of immigrants, it’s meaningful to help them embrace life in Australia.

entries.name: Peter Cook
entries.testimonial: The Mosaic team is warm, supportive, and a joy to work with. I’ve met many grateful clients, and I hope my small contribution helps them build a new life here. Having struggled myself to establish a career decades ago, I feel compelled to support those with an even tougher path.

entries.name: Lizzie Evered
entries.testimonial: I enjoy helping people through what can be a stressful and complex process, and I’ve met so many wonderful people. I believe everyone has a responsibility to help where they can, and volunteering with Mosaic has been a truly meaningful experience.

entries.name: Bill Livingstone
entries.testimonial: I really enjoy the conversations I share during my visits — whether reminiscing about familiar places or chatting about current events, sport, or everyday life. Seeing how much people enjoy and engage in these moments reminds me how meaningful this volunteer work is.

entries.name: Gaylia Bigg
entries.testimonial: Volunteering at the Homework Centre allows me to use my teaching skills and support students as they gain confidence in language and maths. I’ve enjoyed working with the coordinator and volunteers, each bringing unique life experiences, and helping new arrivals while learning from their cultures has been fulfilling and fun.
